intro: Sloanea carrenoi, commonly known as the Carrenoi sloanea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Colombia and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its evergreen foliage and distinctive, clustered inflorescences. Sloanea carrenoi typically grows in humid, shaded environments within montane forests. Its botanical features make it a subject of interest for both horticultural and ecological studies.
